wiz-extension.editorTitleButtonView.description: Show View button (view.pug/view.html) in editor title

wiz-extension.editorTitleButtonComponent.description: Show Component button (view.ts) in editor title

wiz-extension.editorTitleButtonScss.description: Show SCSS button (view.scss) in editor title

wiz-extension.editorTitleButtonApi.description: Show API button (api.py) in editor title

wiz-extension.editorTitleButtonSocket.description: Show Socket button (socket.py) in editor title

wiz-extension.editorTitleButtonInfo.description: Show Info button (app.json) in editor title

commands.title: Open Current File in Split View

view/title.when: view == wizPage || view == wizComponent || view == wizLayout || view == wizAngular || view == wizAssets || view == wizController || view == wizModel || view == wizRoute
